31struct vec2
32{
33 union
34 {
35 struct
36 {
37 float x, y;
38 };
39 float v[2];
40 };
41
42 vec2() {}
43 vec2(float x, float y) : x(x), y(y) {}
44 explicit vec2(const vec &v);
45 explicit vec2(const vec4<float> &v);
46
47 float &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
48 float operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
49
50 bool operator==(const vec2 &o) const { return x == o.x && y == o.y; }
51 bool operator!=(const vec2 &o) const { return x != o.x || y != o.y; }
52
53 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0; }
54 float dot(const vec2 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
55 float squaredlen() const { return dot(*this); }
56 float magnitude() const { return sqrtf(squaredlen()); }
57 vec2 &normalize() { mul(1/magnitude()); return *this; }
58 vec2 &safenormalize() { float m = magnitude(); if(m) mul(1/m); return *this; }
59 float cross(const vec2 &o) const { return x*o.y - y*o.x; }
60 float squaredist(const vec2 &e) const { return vec2(*this).sub(e).squaredlen(); }
61 float dist(const vec2 &e) const { return sqrtf(squaredist(e)); }
62
63 vec2 &mul(float f) { x *= f; y *= f; return *this; }
64 vec2 &mul(const vec2 &o) { x *= o.x; y *= o.y; return *this; }
65 vec2 &square() { mul(*this); return *this; }
66 vec2 &div(float f) { x /= f; y /= f; return *this; }
67 vec2 &div(const vec2 &o) { x /= o.x; y /= o.y; return *this; }
68 vec2 &recip() { x = 1/x; y = 1/y; return *this; }
69 vec2 &add(float f) { x += f; y += f; return *this; }
70 vec2 &add(const vec2 &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; return *this; }
71 vec2 &sub(float f) { x -= f; y -= f; return *this; }
72 vec2 &sub(const vec2 &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; return *this; }
73 vec2 &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; return *this; }
74 vec2 &min(const vec2 &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); return *this; }
75 vec2 &max(const vec2 &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); return *this; }
76 vec2 &min(float f) { x = ::min(x, f); y = ::min(y, f); return *this; }
77 vec2 &max(float f) { x = ::max(x, f); y = ::max(y, f); return *this; }
78 vec2 &abs() { x = fabs(x); y = fabs(y); return *this; }
79 vec2 &clamp(float l, float h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); return *this; }
80 vec2 &reflect(const vec2 &n) { float k = 2*dot(n); x -= k*n.x; y -= k*n.y; return *this; }
81 vec2 &lerp(const vec2 &b, float t) { x += (b.x-x)*t; y += (b.y-y)*t; return *this; }
82 vec2 &lerp(const vec2 &a, const vec2 &b, float t) { x = a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t; y = a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t; return *this; }
83 vec2 &avg(const vec2 &b) { add(b); mul(0.5f); return *this; }
84
85 vec2 operator+(const vec2 &v2) const
86 {
87 return vec2(x+v2.x, y+v2.y);
88 }
89
90 vec2 operator-(const vec2 &v2) const
91 {
92 return vec2(x-v2.x, y-v2.y);

96 {
97 return vec2(-x, -y);

126 vec2 &msub(const vec2 &a, const B &b) { return sub(vec2(a).mul(b)); }

128 vec2 &rotate_around_z(float c, float s) { float rx = x, ry = y; x = c*rx-s*ry; y = c*ry+s*rx; return *this; }
129 vec2 &rotate_around_z(float angle) { return rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
130 vec2 &rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }

133inline bool htcmp(const vec2 &x, const vec2 &y)
134{
135 return x == y;
136}
137
138inline uint hthash(const vec2 &k)
139{
140 union
141 {
142 uint i;
143 float f;
144 } x, y;
145 x.f = k.x;
146 y.f = k.y;
147 uint v = x.i^y.i;
148 return v + (v>>12);
149}

160struct vec
161{
162 union
163 {
164 struct
165 {
166 float x, y, z;
167 };
168 struct
169 {
170 float r, g, b;
171 };
172 float v[3];
173 };

186 vec(float yaw, float pitch) : x(-std::sin(yaw)*cosf(pitch)), y(cosf(yaw)*cosf(pitch)), z(std::sin(pitch)) {}
187 vec &set(int i, float f) { v[i] = f; return *this; }

233 //unary operators
234 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0 && z==0; }
235 float squaredlen() const { return x*x + y*y + z*z; }
236 vec &square() { mul(*this); return *this; }
237 vec &neg2() { x = -x; y = -y; return *this; } //unused
238 vec &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; z = -z; return *this; } //overloaded by operator-()
239 vec &abs() { x = fabs(x); y = fabs(y); z = fabs(z); return *this; }
240 vec &recip() { x = 1/x; y = 1/y; z = 1/z; return *this; } //used twice
241 float magnitude2() const { return sqrtf(dot2(*this)); }
242 float magnitude() const { return sqrtf(squaredlen()); }
243 vec &normalize() { div(magnitude()); return *this; }
244 vec &safenormalize() { float m = magnitude(); if(m) div(m); return *this; }
245 bool isnormalized() const { float m = squaredlen(); return (m>0.99f && m<1.01f); }
246
247 //elementwise float operators
248 vec &mul(float f) { x *= f; y *= f; z *= f; return *this; }
249 vec &mul2(float f) { x *= f; y *= f; return *this; } //unused
250 vec &div(float f) { x /= f; y /= f; z /= f; return *this; }
251 vec &div2(float f) { x /= f; y /= f; return *this; } //unused
252 vec &add(float f) { x += f; y += f; z += f; return *this; }
253 vec &add2(float f) { x += f; y += f; return *this; } //used once
254 vec &addz(float f) { z += f; return *this; } //unused
255 vec &sub(float f) { x -= f; y -= f; z -= f; return *this; }
256 vec &sub2(float f) { x -= f; y -= f; return *this; } //unused
257 vec &subz(float f) { z -= f; return *this; } //unused

259 vec &max(float f) { x = ::max(x, f); y = ::max(y, f); z = ::max(z, f); return *this; }
260 vec &clamp(float l, float h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); z = ::std::clamp(z, l, h); return *this; }

265 vec &add(const vec &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; z += o.z; return *this; }
266 vec &sub(const vec &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; z -= o.z; return *this; }
267 vec &min(const vec &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); z = ::min(z, o.z); return *this; }

269
270 //dot products
271 float dot2(const vec2 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
272 float dot2(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
273 float dot(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
274 float squaredot(const vec &o) const { float k = dot(o); return k*k; } //unused
275 float absdot(const vec &o) const { return fabs(x*o.x) + fabs(y*o.y) + fabs(z*o.z); } //used once
276 float zdot(const vec &o) const { return z*o.z; } //unused
277
278 //distances
279 float squaredist(const vec &e) const { return vec(*this).sub(e).squaredlen(); }
280 float dist(const vec &e) const { return sqrtf(squaredist(e)); }
281 float dist(const vec &e, vec &t) const { t = *this; t.sub(e); return t.magnitude(); }
282 float dist2(const vec &o) const { float dx = x-o.x, dy = y-o.y; return sqrtf(dx*dx + dy*dy); }
283
284 //cross products
285 template<class T>
286 bool reject(const T &o, float r) const { return x>o.x+r || x<o.x-r || y>o.y+r || y<o.y-r; }
287
288 template<class A, class B>
289 vec &cross(const A &a, const B &b) { x = a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y; y = a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z; z = a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x; return *this; }
290
291 vec &cross(const vec &o, const vec &a, const vec &b) { return cross(vec(a).sub(o), vec(b).sub(o)); }
292
296 float scalartriple(const vec &a, const vec &b) const { return x*(a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y) + y*(a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z) + z*(a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x); }
297 float zscalartriple(const vec &a, const vec &b) const { return z*(a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x); } //unused
298
299 //transformations
300 vec &reflectz(float rz) { z = 2*rz - z; return *this; }
301 vec &reflect(const vec &n) { float k = 2*dot(n); x -= k*n.x; y -= k*n.y; z -= k*n.z; return *this; }
302 vec &project(const vec &n) { float k = dot(n); x -= k*n.x; y -= k*n.y; z -= k*n.z; return *this; }
303 vec &projectxydir(const vec &n) { if(n.z) z = -(x*n.x/n.z + y*n.y/n.z); return *this; } //used once
304 vec &projectxy(const vec &n)
305 {
306 float m = squaredlen(), k = dot(n);
307 projectxydir(n);
308 rescale(sqrtf(::max(m - k*k, 0.0f)));
309 return *this;
310 } //used once
311 vec &projectxy(const vec &n, float threshold)
312 {
313 float m = squaredlen(), k = ::min(dot(n), threshold);
314 projectxydir(n);
315 rescale(sqrtf(::max(m - k*k, 0.0f)));
316 return *this;
317 } //used once
318 vec &lerp(const vec &b, float t) { x += (b.x-x)*t; y += (b.y-y)*t; z += (b.z-z)*t; return *this; }
319 vec &lerp(const vec &a, const vec &b, float t) { x = a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t; y = a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t; z = a.z + (b.z-a.z)*t; return *this; }
320 vec &avg(const vec &b) { add(b); mul(0.5f); return *this; }

323 vec &madd(const vec &a, const B &b) { return add(vec(a).mul(b)); }
324
325 template<class B>
326 vec &msub(const vec &a, const B &b) { return sub(vec(a).mul(b)); }

328 vec &rescale(float k)
329 {
330 float mag = magnitude();
331 if(mag > 1e-6f) mul(k / mag);
332 return *this;
333 }
334
335 vec &rotate_around_z(float c, float s) { float rx = x, ry = y; x = c*rx-s*ry; y = c*ry+s*rx; return *this; }
336 vec &rotate_around_x(float c, float s) { float ry = y, rz = z; y = c*ry-s*rz; z = c*rz+s*ry; return *this; }
337 vec &rotate_around_y(float c, float s) { float rx = x, rz = z; x = c*rx+s*rz; z = c*rz-s*rx; return *this; }
338
339 vec &rotate_around_z(float angle) { return rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
340 vec &rotate_around_x(float angle) { return rotate_around_x(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
341 vec &rotate_around_y(float angle) { return rotate_around_y(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
342
343 vec &rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }
344 vec &rotate_around_x(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_x(sc.x, sc.y); }
345 vec &rotate_around_y(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_y(sc.x, sc.y); }
346
347 vec &rotate(float c, float s, const vec &d)
348 {
349 *this = vec(x*(d.x*d.x*(1-c)+c) + y*(d.x*d.y*(1-c)-d.z*s) + z*(d.x*d.z*(1-c)+d.y*s),
350 x*(d.y*d.x*(1-c)+d.z*s) + y*(d.y*d.y*(1-c)+c) + z*(d.y*d.z*(1-c)-d.x*s),
351 x*(d.x*d.z*(1-c)-d.y*s) + y*(d.y*d.z*(1-c)+d.x*s) + z*(d.z*d.z*(1-c)+c));
352 return *this;
353 }
354 vec &rotate(float angle, const vec &d) { return rotate(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle), d); }
355 vec &rotate(const vec2 &sc, const vec &d) { return rotate(sc.x, sc.y, d); }
356
357 void orthogonal(const vec &d)
358 {
359 *this = fabs(d.x) > fabs(d.z) ? vec(-d.y, d.x, 0) : vec(0, -d.z, d.y);
360 }
361
362 void orthonormalize(vec &s, vec &t) const
363 {
364 s.project(*this);
365 t.project(*this).project(s);
366 } //unused
367
368 template<class T>
369 bool insidebb(const T &bbmin, const T &bbmax) const
370 {
371 return x >= bbmin.x && x <= bbmax.x && y >= bbmin.y && y <= bbmax.y && z >= bbmin.z && z <= bbmax.z;
372 }
373
374 template<class T, class U>
375 bool insidebb(const T &bbmin, const T &bbmax, U margin) const
376 {
377 return x >= bbmin.x-margin && x <= bbmax.x+margin && y >= bbmin.y-margin && y <= bbmax.y+margin && z >= bbmin.z-margin && z <= bbmax.z+margin;
378 }
379
380 template<class T, class U>
381 bool insidebb(const T &o, U size) const
382 {
383 return x >= o.x && x <= o.x + size && y >= o.y && y <= o.y + size && z >= o.z && z <= o.z + size;
384 }
385
386 template<class T, class U>
387 bool insidebb(const T &o, U size, U margin) const
388 {
389 size += margin;
390 return x >= o.x-margin && x <= o.x + size && y >= o.y-margin && y <= o.y + size && z >= o.z-margin && z <= o.z + size;
391 }
392
393 template<class T>
394 float dist_to_bb(const T &min, const T &max) const
395 {
396 float sqrdist = 0;
397 for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
398 {
399 if (v[i] < min[i])
400 {
401 float delta = v[i]-min[i];
402 sqrdist += delta*delta;
403 }
404 else if(v[i] > max[i])
405 {
406 float delta = max[i]-v[i];
407 sqrdist += delta*delta;
408 }
409 }
410 return sqrtf(sqrdist);
411 }
412
413 template<class T, class S>
414 float dist_to_bb(const T &o, S size) const
415 {
416 return dist_to_bb(o, T(o).add(size));
417 }
418
419 template<class T>
420 float project_bb(const T &min, const T &max) const
421 {
422 return x*(x < 0 ? max.x : min.x) + y*(y < 0 ? max.y : min.y) + z*(z < 0 ? max.z : min.z);
423 }
424
425 static vec hexcolor(int color)
426 {
427 return vec(((color>>16)&0xFF)*(1.0f/255.0f), ((color>>8)&0xFF)*(1.0f/255.0f), (color&0xFF)*(1.0f/255.0f));
428 }
429
430 int tohexcolor() const
431 {
432 return (static_cast<int>(::std::clamp(r, 0.0f, 1.0f)*255)<<16) |
433 (static_cast<int>(::std::clamp(g, 0.0f, 1.0f)*255)<<8) |
434 static_cast<int>(::std::clamp(b, 0.0f, 1.0f)*255);
435 }
436};

438inline vec2::vec2(const vec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}

440inline bool htcmp(const vec &x, const vec &y)
441{
442 return x == y;
443}
444
445inline uint hthash(const vec &k)
446{
447 union { uint i; float f; } x, y, z;
448 x.f = k.x;
449 y.f = k.y;
450 z.f = k.z;
451 uint v = x.i^y.i^z.i;
452 return v + (v>>12);
453}
454
455template<>
456struct std::hash<vec> {
457 size_t operator()(const vec& k) const {
458 union { uint i; float f; } x, y, z;
459 x.f = k.x;
460 y.f = k.y;
461 z.f = k.z;
462 uint v = x.i^y.i^z.i;
463 return v + (v>>12);
464 }
465};
466
470struct bvec
471{
472 union
473 {
474 struct
475 {
476 uchar x, y, z;
477 };
478 struct
479 {
480 uchar r, g, b;
481 };
482 uchar v[3];
483 };
484
485 bvec() {}
486 bvec(uchar x, uchar y, uchar z) : x(x), y(y), z(z) {}
487 explicit bvec(const vec &v) : x(static_cast<uchar>((v.x+1)*(255.0f/2.0f))), y(static_cast<uchar>((v.y+1)*(255.0f/2.0f))), z(static_cast<uchar>((v.z+1)*(255.0f/2.0f))) {}
488 explicit bvec(const vec4<uchar> &v);
489
490 uchar &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
491 uchar operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
492
493 bool operator==(const bvec &v) const { return x==v.x && y==v.y && z==v.z; }
494 bool operator!=(const bvec &v) const { return x!=v.x || y!=v.y || z!=v.z; }
495
496 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0 && z==0; }
497
498 vec tonormal() const { return vec(x*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, y*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, z*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f); }
499
500 bvec &normalize()
501 {
502 vec n(x-127.5f, y-127.5f, z-127.5f);
503 float mag = 127.5f/n.magnitude();
504 x = static_cast<uchar>(n.x*mag+127.5f);
505 y = static_cast<uchar>(n.y*mag+127.5f);
506 z = static_cast<uchar>(n.z*mag+127.5f);
507 return *this;
508 }
509
510 void lerp(const bvec &a, const bvec &b, float t)
511 {
512 x = static_cast<uchar>(a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t);
513 y = static_cast<uchar>(a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t);
514 z = static_cast<uchar>(a.z + (b.z-a.z)*t);
515 }
516
517 void lerp(const bvec &a, const bvec &b, int ka, int kb, int d)
518 {
519 x = static_cast<uchar>((a.x*ka + b.x*kb)/d);
520 y = static_cast<uchar>((a.y*ka + b.y*kb)/d);
521 z = static_cast<uchar>((a.z*ka + b.z*kb)/d);
522 }
523
524 void flip()
525 {
526 x ^= 0x80;
527 y ^= 0x80;
528 z ^= 0x80;
529 }
530
531 void scale(int k, int d)
532 {
533 x = static_cast<uchar>((x*k)/d);
534 y = static_cast<uchar>((y*k)/d);
535 z = static_cast<uchar>((z*k)/d);
536 }
537
538 bvec &shl(int n)
539 {
540 x <<= n;
541 y <<= n;
542 z <<= n;
543 return *this;
544 }
545 bvec &shr(int n)
546 {
547 x >>= n;
548 y >>= n;
549 z >>= n;
550 return *this;
551 }
552
553 static bvec fromcolor(const vec &v)
554 {
555 return bvec(static_cast<uchar>(v.x*255.0f), static_cast<uchar>(v.y*255.0f), static_cast<uchar>(v.z*255.0f));
556 }
557
558 vec tocolor() const
559 {
560 return vec(x*(1.0f/255.0f), y*(1.0f/255.0f), z*(1.0f/255.0f));
561 }
562
563 static bvec from565(ushort c)
564 {
565 return bvec((((c>>11)&0x1F)*527 + 15) >> 6, (((c>>5)&0x3F)*259 + 35) >> 6, ((c&0x1F)*527 + 15) >> 6);
566 }
567
568 static bvec hexcolor(int color)
569 {
570 return bvec((color>>16)&0xFF, (color>>8)&0xFF, color&0xFF);
571 }
572
573 int tohexcolor() const
574 {
575 return (static_cast<int>(r)<<16)|(static_cast<int>(g)<<8)|static_cast<int>(b);
576 }
577};
578
587template<typename T>
588struct vec4
589{
590 union
591 {
592 struct { T x, y, z, w; };
593 struct { T r, g, b, a; };
594 T v[4];
595 uint mask;
596 };
597
598 vec4() {}
599 explicit vec4(const vec &p, T w = 0) : x(p.x), y(p.y), z(p.z), w(w) {}
600 explicit vec4(const vec2 &p, T z = 0, T w = 0) : x(p.x), y(p.y), z(z), w(w) {}
601 vec4(T x, T y, T z, T w) : x(x), y(y), z(z), w(w) {}
602 vec4(bvec v, uchar c)
603 {
604 x = v.x;
605 y = v.y;
606 z = v.z;
607 w = c;
608 }
609 vec4(bvec v)
610 {
611 x = v.x;
612 y = v.y;
613 z = v.z;
614 w = 0;
615 }
616
617 explicit vec4(const T *v) : x(v[0]), y(v[1]), z(v[2]), w(v[3]) {}
618
619 template<class U>
620 operator vec4<U>()
621 {
622 return vec4<U>(static_cast<U>(this->x),
623 static_cast<U>(this->y),
624 static_cast<U>(this->z),
625 static_cast<U>(this->w));
626 }
627
628 T &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
629 T operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
630
631 bool operator==(const vec4 &o) const { return x == o.x && y == o.y && z == o.z && w == o.w; }
632 bool operator!=(const vec4 &o) const { return x != o.x || y != o.y || z != o.z || w != o.w; }
633
644 T dot3(const vec4 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
645
656 T dot3(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
657
668 T dot(const vec4 &o) const { return dot3(o) + w*o.w; }
669
679 T dot(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z + w; }
680
689 T squaredlen() const { return dot(*this); }
690
699 T magnitude() const { return sqrtf(squaredlen()); }
700
709 T magnitude3() const { return sqrtf(dot3(*this)); }
710
718 vec4 &normalize() { mul(1/magnitude()); return *this; }
719
727 vec4 &safenormalize() { T m = magnitude(); if(m) mul(1/m); return *this; }
728
729 void lerp(const vec4<uchar> &a, const vec4<uchar> &b, float t)
730 {
731 x = static_cast<uchar>(a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t);
732 y = static_cast<uchar>(a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t);
733 z = static_cast<uchar>(a.z + (b.z-a.z)*t);
734 w = a.w;
735 }
736
737 void lerp(const vec4<uchar> &a, const vec4<uchar> &b, int ka, int kb, int d)
738 {
739 x = static_cast<uchar>((a.x*ka + b.x*kb)/d);
740 y = static_cast<uchar>((a.y*ka + b.y*kb)/d);
741 z = static_cast<uchar>((a.z*ka + b.z*kb)/d);
742 w = a.w;
743 }
744
745 void lerp(const vec4<uchar> &a, const vec4<uchar> &b, const vec4<uchar> &c, float ta, float tb, float tc)
746 {
747 x = static_cast<uchar>(a.x*ta + b.x*tb + c.x*tc);
748 y = static_cast<uchar>(a.y*ta + b.y*tb + c.y*tc);
749 z = static_cast<uchar>(a.z*ta + b.z*tb + c.z*tc);
750 w = static_cast<uchar>(a.w*ta + b.w*tb + c.w*tc);
751 }
752
758 void flip() { mask ^= 0x80808080; }
759
760 vec4 &lerp(const vec4 &b, T t)
761 {
762 x += (b.x-x)*t;
763 y += (b.y-y)*t;
764 z += (b.z-z)*t;
765 w += (b.w-w)*t;
766 return *this;
767 }
768 vec4 &lerp(const vec4 &a, const vec4 &b, T t)
769 {
770 x = a.x+(b.x-a.x)*t;
771 y = a.y+(b.y-a.y)*t;
772 z = a.z+(b.z-a.z)*t;
773 w = a.w+(b.w-a.w)*t;
774 return *this;
775 }
776
788 vec4 &avg(const vec4 &b) { add(b); mul(0.5f); return *this; }
789
790 template<class B>
791 vec4 &madd(const vec4 &a, const B &b) { return add(vec4(a).mul(b)); }
792
793 template<class B>
794 vec4 &msub(const vec4 &a, const B &b) { return sub(vec4(a).mul(b)); }
795
806 vec4 &mul3(T f) { x *= f; y *= f; z *= f; return *this; }
807
818 vec4 &mul(T f) { mul3(f); w *= f; return *this; }
819
831 vec4 &mul(const vec4 &o) { x *= o.x; y *= o.y; z *= o.z; w *= o.w; return *this; }
832
844 vec4 &mul(const vec &o) { x *= o.x; y *= o.y; z *= o.z; return *this; }
845
854 vec4 &square() { mul(*this); return *this; }
855
867 vec4 &div3(T f) { x /= f; y /= f; z /= f; return *this; }
868
879 vec4 &div(T f) { div3(f); w /= f; return *this; }
880
891 vec4 &div(const vec4 &o) { x /= o.x; y /= o.y; z /= o.z; w /= o.w; return *this; }
892
903 vec4 &div(const vec &o) { x /= o.x; y /= o.y; z /= o.z; return *this; }
904
913 vec4 &recip() { x = 1/x; y = 1/y; z = 1/z; w = 1/w; return *this; }
914
925 vec4 &add(const vec4 &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; z += o.z; w += o.w; return *this; }
926
938 vec4 &add(const vec &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; z += o.z; return *this; }
939
950 vec4 &add3(T f) { x += f; y += f; z += f; return *this; }
951
962 vec4 &add(T f) { add3(f); w += f; return *this; }
963
974 vec4 &addw(T f) { w += f; return *this; }
975
986 vec4 &sub(const vec4 &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; z -= o.z; w -= o.w; return *this; }
987
998 vec4 &sub(const vec &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; z -= o.z; return *this; }
999
1010 vec4 &sub3(T f) { x -= f; y -= f; z -= f; return *this; }
1011 vec4 &sub(T f) { sub3(f); w -= f; return *this; }
1012 vec4 &subw(T f) { w -= f; return *this; }
1013 vec4 &neg3() { x = -x; y = -y; z = -z; return *this; }
1014 vec4 &neg() { neg3(); w = -w; return *this; }
1015 vec4 &clamp(T l, T h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); z = ::std::clamp(z, l, h); w = ::std::clamp(w, l, h); return *this; }
1016
1017
1018 vec4 operator+(const vec4 &v2) const
1019 {
1020 return vec4(x+v2.x, y+v2.y, z+v2.z, w+v2.w);
1021 }
1022
1023 vec4 operator-(const vec4 &v2) const
1024 {
1025 return vec4(x-v2.x, y-v2.y, z-v2.z, w+v2.w);
1026 }
1027
1028 vec4 operator-() const
1029 {
1030 return vec4(-x, -y, -z, -w);
1031 }
1032
1033 template<typename U>
1034 vec4 operator*(const U &n) const
1035 {
1036 return vec4(n*x, n*y, n*z, n*w);
1037 }
1038
1039 vec4 operator*(const vec4 &v2) const
1040 {
1041 return vec4(x*v2.x, y*v2.y, z*v2.z, w*v2.w);
1042 }
1043
1044 template<typename U>
1045 vec4 operator/(const U &n) const
1046 {
1047 return vec4(x/n, y/n, z/n, w/n);
1048 }
1049
1050 vec4 operator/(const vec4 &v2) const
1051 {
1052 return vec4(x/v2.x, y/v2.y, z/v2.z, w/v2.w);
1053 }
1054
1055
1056 template<class A, class B>
1057 vec4 &cross(const A &a, const B &b) { x = a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y; y = a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z; z = a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x; return *this; }
1058
1059 vec4 &cross(const vec &o, const vec &a, const vec &b) { return cross(vec(a).sub(o), vec(b).sub(o)); }
1060
1061 void setxyz(const vec &v) { x = v.x; y = v.y; z = v.z; }
1062
1063 vec4 &rotate_around_z(T c, T s) { T rx = x, ry = y; x = c*rx-s*ry; y = c*ry+s*rx; return *this; }
1064 vec4 &rotate_around_x(T c, T s) { T ry = y, rz = z; y = c*ry-s*rz; z = c*rz+s*ry; return *this; }
1065 vec4 &rotate_around_y(T c, T s) { T rx = x, rz = z; x = c*rx-s*rz; z = c*rz+s*rx; return *this; }
1066
1067 vec4 &rotate_around_z(T angle) { return rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1068 vec4 &rotate_around_x(T angle) { return rotate_around_x(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1069 vec4 &rotate_around_y(T angle) { return rotate_around_y(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1070
1071 vec4 &rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }
1072 vec4 &rotate_around_x(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_x(sc.x, sc.y); }
1073 vec4 &rotate_around_y(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_y(sc.x, sc.y); }
1074
1075 vec tonormal() const { return vec(x*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, y*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, z*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f); }
1076
1077};
1078inline vec2::vec2(const vec4<float> &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
1079inline vec::vec(const vec4<float> &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}

1663
1664/*
1665
1666The engine uses 3 different linear coordinate systems
1667which are oriented around each of the axis dimensions.
1668
1669So any point within the game can be defined by four coordinates: (d, x, y, z)
1670
1671d is the reference axis dimension
1672x is the coordinate of the ROW dimension
1673y is the coordinate of the COL dimension
1674z is the coordinate of the reference dimension (DEPTH)
1675
1676typically, if d is not used, then it is implicitly the Z dimension.
1677ie: d=z => x=x, y=y, z=z
1678
1679*/
1680
1681// DIM: X=0 Y=1 Z=2.
1682const int R[3] = {1, 2, 0};
1683const int C[3] = {2, 0, 1};
1684const int D[3] = {0, 1, 2};
1686struct ivec2;
1687
1688//integer vector3
1689struct ivec
1690{
1691 union
1692 {
1693 struct
1694 {
1695 int x, y, z;
1696 };
1697 struct
1698 {
1699 int r, g, b;
1700 };
1701 int v[3];
1702 };
1703
1704 ivec() {}
1705 explicit ivec(const vec &v) : x(static_cast<int>(v.x)), y(static_cast<int>(v.y)), z(static_cast<int>(v.z)) {}
1706 ivec(int a, int b, int c) : x(a), y(b), z(c) {}
1707 ivec(int d, int row, int col, int depth)
1708 {
1709 v[R[d]] = row;
1710 v[C[d]] = col;
1711 v[D[d]] = depth;
1712 }
1713 ivec(int i, const ivec &co, int size) : x(co.x+((i&1)>>0)*size), y(co.y+((i&2)>>1)*size), z(co.z +((i&4)>>2)*size) {}
1714 explicit ivec(const ivec2 &v, int z = 0);
1715 explicit ivec(const svec &v);
1716
1717 int &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
1718 int operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
1719
1720 //int idx(int i) { return v[i]; }
1721 bool operator==(const ivec &v) const { return x==v.x && y==v.y && z==v.z; }
1722 bool operator!=(const ivec &v) const { return x!=v.x || y!=v.y || z!=v.z; }
1723 ivec operator+(const ivec &v) const { return ivec(x+v.x, y+v.y, z+v.z); }
1724 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0 && z==0; }
1725 ivec &shl(int n) { x<<= n; y<<= n; z<<= n; return *this; }
1726 ivec &shr(int n) { x>>= n; y>>= n; z>>= n; return *this; }
1727 ivec &mul(int n) { x *= n; y *= n; z *= n; return *this; }
1728 ivec &div(int n) { x /= n; y /= n; z /= n; return *this; }
1729 ivec &add(int n) { x += n; y += n; z += n; return *this; }
1730 ivec &sub(int n) { x -= n; y -= n; z -= n; return *this; }
1731 ivec &mul(const ivec &v) { x *= v.x; y *= v.y; z *= v.z; return *this; }
1732 ivec &div(const ivec &v) { x /= v.x; y /= v.y; z /= v.z; return *this; }
1733 ivec &add(const ivec &v) { x += v.x; y += v.y; z += v.z; return *this; }
1734 ivec &sub(const ivec &v) { x -= v.x; y -= v.y; z -= v.z; return *this; }
1735 ivec &mask(int n) { x &= n; y &= n; z &= n; return *this; }
1736 ivec &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; z = -z; return *this; }
1737 ivec &min(const ivec &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); z = ::min(z, o.z); return *this; }
1738 ivec &max(const ivec &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); z = ::max(z, o.z); return *this; }
1739 ivec &min(int n) { x = ::min(x, n); y = ::min(y, n); z = ::min(z, n); return *this; }
1740 ivec &max(int n) { x = ::max(x, n); y = ::max(y, n); z = ::max(z, n); return *this; }
1741 ivec &abs() { x = ::abs(x); y = ::abs(y); z = ::abs(z); return *this; }
1742 ivec &clamp(int l, int h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); z = ::std::clamp(z, l, h); return *this; }
1743 ivec &cross(const ivec &a, const ivec &b) { x = a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y; y = a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z; z = a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x; return *this; }
1744 int dot(const ivec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
1745 float dist(const plane &p) const;
1746
1747 static inline ivec floor(const vec &o) { return ivec(static_cast<int>(::floor(o.x)), static_cast<int>(::floor(o.y)), static_cast<int>(::floor(o.z))); }
1748 static inline ivec ceil(const vec &o) { return ivec(static_cast<int>(::ceil(o.x)), static_cast<int>(::ceil(o.y)), static_cast<int>(::ceil(o.z))); }
1749};
1750
1751inline vec::vec(const ivec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}
1752
1753inline bool htcmp(const ivec &x, const ivec &y)
1754{
1755 return x == y;
1756}
1757
1758inline uint hthash(const ivec &k)
1759{
1760 return k.x^k.y^k.z;
1761}
1762
1763template<>
1764struct std::hash<ivec> {
1765 size_t operator()(const ivec &k) const {
1766 return k.x^k.y^k.z;
1767 }
1768};
1769
1773struct ivec2
1774{
1775 union
1776 {
1777 struct { int x, y; };
1778 int v[2];
1779 };
1780
1781 ivec2() {}
1782 ivec2(int x, int y) : x(x), y(y) {}
1783 explicit ivec2(const vec2 &v) : x(static_cast<int>(v.x)), y(static_cast<int>(v.y)) {}
1784 explicit ivec2(const ivec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
1785
1786 int &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
1787 int operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
1788
1789 bool operator==(const ivec2 &o) const { return x == o.x && y == o.y; }
1790 bool operator!=(const ivec2 &o) const { return x != o.x || y != o.y; }
1791
1792 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0; }
1793 ivec2 &shl(int n) { x<<= n; y<<= n; return *this; }
1794 ivec2 &shr(int n) { x>>= n; y>>= n; return *this; }
1795 ivec2 &mul(int n) { x *= n; y *= n; return *this; }
1796 ivec2 &div(int n) { x /= n; y /= n; return *this; }
1797 ivec2 &add(int n) { x += n; y += n; return *this; }
1798 ivec2 &sub(int n) { x -= n; y -= n; return *this; }
1799 ivec2 &mul(const ivec2 &v) { x *= v.x; y *= v.y; return *this; }
1800 ivec2 &div(const ivec2 &v) { x /= v.x; y /= v.y; return *this; }
1801 ivec2 &add(const ivec2 &v) { x += v.x; y += v.y; return *this; }
1802 ivec2 &sub(const ivec2 &v) { x -= v.x; y -= v.y; return *this; }
1803 ivec2 &mask(int n) { x &= n; y &= n; return *this; }
1804 ivec2 &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; return *this; }
1805 ivec2 &min(const ivec2 &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); return *this; }
1806 ivec2 &max(const ivec2 &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); return *this; }
1807 ivec2 &min(int n) { x = ::min(x, n); y = ::min(y, n); return *this; }
1808 ivec2 &max(int n) { x = ::max(x, n); y = ::max(y, n); return *this; }
1809 ivec2 &abs() { x = ::abs(x); y = ::abs(y); return *this; }
1810 int dot(const ivec2 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
1811 int cross(const ivec2 &o) const { return x*o.y - y*o.x; }
1812};

1821struct svec
1822{

1826 short v[3];
1827 };

1830 svec(short x, short y, short z) : x(x), y(y), z(z) {}
1831 explicit svec(const ivec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}

1839
1843struct matrix4
1844{
1845 vec4<float> a, b, c, d;
1846
1847 template<class T, class U>
1848 T transformnormal(const U &in) const
1849 {
1850 T v;
1851 transformnormal(in, v);
1852 return v;
1853 }
1854
1855 template<class T, class U>
1856 T transform(const U &in) const
1857 {
1858 T v;
1859 transform(in, v);
1860 return v;
1861 }
1862
1863 template<class T>
1864 vec perspectivetransform(const T &in) const
1865 {
1866 vec4<float> v;
1867 transform(in, v);
1868 return vec(v).div(v.w);
1869 }
1870
1871 template<class T>
1872 void mult(const matrix4 &x, const matrix4 &y)
1873 {
1874 a = T(x.a).mul(y.a.x).madd(x.b, y.a.y).madd(x.c, y.a.z).madd(x.d, y.a.w);
1875 b = T(x.a).mul(y.b.x).madd(x.b, y.b.y).madd(x.c, y.b.z).madd(x.d, y.b.w);
1876 c = T(x.a).mul(y.c.x).madd(x.b, y.c.y).madd(x.c, y.c.z).madd(x.d, y.c.w);
1877 d = T(x.a).mul(y.d.x).madd(x.b, y.d.y).madd(x.c, y.d.z).madd(x.d, y.d.w);
1878 }
1879
1880 matrix4();

2061//generic two dimensional vector
2062template<class T>
2063struct GenericVec2
2064{
2065 T x,y;
2066
2067 GenericVec2() {}
2068 GenericVec2(T x, T y) : x(x), y(y) {}
2069 GenericVec2(const vec2 &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
2070
2071 bool operator==(const GenericVec2 &h) const { return x == h.x && y == h.y; }
2072 bool operator!=(const GenericVec2 &h) const { return x != h.x || y != h.y; }
2073};
2074
2075//generic three dmensional vector
2076template<class T>
2077struct GenericVec3
2078{
2079 T x,y,z;
2080
2081 GenericVec3() {}
2082 GenericVec3(T x, T y, T z) : x(x), y(y), z(z) {}
2083 GenericVec3(const vec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}
2084
2085 GenericVec3<T> operator+(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return GenericVec3<T>(x+h.x, y+h.y,z+h.z); }
2086 GenericVec3<T> operator-(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return GenericVec3<T>(x-h.x, y-h.y, z-h.z); }
2087
2088 //comparison
2089 bool operator==(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x == h.x && y == h.y && z == h.z; }
2090 bool operator!=(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x != h.x || y != h.y || z != h.z; }
2091 bool operator>(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x > h.x && y > h.y && z > h.z; }
2092 bool operator<(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x < h.x && y < h.y && z < h.z; }
2093 bool operator>=(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x >= h.x && y >= h.y && z >= h.z; }
2094 bool operator<=(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x <= h.x && y <= h.y && z <= h.z; }
2095};

2102extern const vec2 sincos360[];
2113inline int mod360(int angle)
2114{
2115 if(angle < 0)
2116 {
2117 angle = 360 + (angle <= -360 ? angle%360 : angle);
2118 }
2119 else if(angle >= 360)
2120 {
2121 angle %= 360;
2122 }
2123 return angle;
2124}
2125
2133inline const vec2 &sincosmod360(int angle) { return sincos360[mod360(angle)]; }
2134
2144inline float cos360(int angle) { return sincos360[angle].x; }
2145
2155inline float sin360(int angle) { return sincos360[angle].y; }
2156
2166inline float tan360(int angle) { const vec2 &sc = sincos360[angle]; return sc.y/sc.x; }
2167
2177inline float cotan360(int angle) { const vec2 &sc = sincos360[angle]; return sc.x/sc.y; }
